subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez singled in two runs in the first inning and Josh Beckett pitched eight innings to help the Red Sox to a 12-4 victory against the Devil Rays on Saturday.
snippet: Manny Ramírez singled in two runs in the first inning and Josh Beckett pitched eight innings to help the Red Sox to a 12-4 victory against the Devil Rays on Saturday.
